Title: Relates to the consideration of gender affirming care in custody matters
Summary: Prohibits a court from granting, denying or deciding a petition for guardianship, custody or visitation solely on the allegation or basis that a parent or guardian is providing or facilitating the provision of gender affirming care to the subject child.
LawCode: Add ยง75-n, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to the consideration of gender affirming care in custody matters
